### Work Sheet 1

#### Question 1
Consider the following matrices \textbf{A} and \textbf{B} which are given as


\[ A = \left(
  \begin{array}{ccc}
0 & 2 & 1 \\
2 &1 &2\\
1 &2 &0\\
  \end{array}
\right) \qquad
B = \left(
\begin{array}{ccc}
1 &0 &1\\
2 &1 &0\\
1 &2 &1\\
\end{array}
\right)
\]

#### Question 1

a. Show that \textbf{AB} and \textbf{BA} are not equal. [3 Marks]
b. Find matrices C, D and E such that

i.\textbf{B} + \textbf{C} = \textbf{A}
ii \textbf{BD} = \textbf{B}
iii. \textbf{B} - \textbf{E} = \textbf{A}. [3 Marks]


#### Question 2


a. Write down the augmented matrix for the following system of equations.
b. Use Gaussian elimination to solve the system. 

\[2x + y - z = 2\]
\[x - y + z = 4\]
\[x + 2y + 2z = 10\]
